ingredients.ingredient: 8 cups fresh apricots - peeled, pitted, and crushed
5 (1 pint) canning jars with lids and rings
ingredients.normalizedName: Canning Jar with Lid and Ring

cookingTips: Use a heavy-bottomed pot to distribute heat evenly and prevent sticking
Test jam set by placing a small amount on a cold plate; it should wrinkle when pushed
Skim foam from surface during cooking for clearer, more attractive jam
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How does lemon juice affect both the flavor and the setting properties of apricot jam?
